blogs.title: Quantum Tennis
blogs.blurb: Ever wanted to teleport, walk through walls, or have your clones? Because in this article we will go over objects that possess such characteristics; objects that you encounter every single day, even right now.

blogs.title: Teleportation
blogs.blurb: Ever wished if teleportation was real like just think about all the possibilities you could achieve by the simple act of moving quickly from one location to the other, but unfortunately, it's quite not possible or is it..

blogs.title: Quantum Field Theory
blogs.blurb: In today's article, we will be attempting to understand the Quantum Field Theory. As an overview, Quantum Physics is a fundamental theory that describes the physical properties of nature at the atomic and subatomic scale.

blogs.title: Higgs Boson
blogs.blurb: If you are a particle physics enthusiast, then you very well remember the year 2012. It was the time when CERN scientists confirmed the detection of the long-sought Higgs boson, also known by its nickname the "God Particle", at the LHC.

projects.title: Sockets ChatApp
projects.blurb: Socket-ChatApp is a basic server and client communication system between two nodes on a network. One socket(node) listens on a particular port of an IP, while the other attempts to connect with that socket to form a connection.

projects.title: Monkey Type Bot
projects.blurb: The Monkeytype bot assists fellow typists who may not have fast typing skills in improving their speed. Remember, 'MONKEY SEE, MONKEY HELP IN MONKEY TYPE.'

projects.title: Sort Algorithms
projects.blurb: Above are implementation of thought-experiment esque sorting algorithms that technically can beat or come close to beating the quick sort algorithm, but highly unlikely when considering the best and worst case scenario.

projects.title: Reverse Shell
projects.blurb: A Reverse Shell, also known as a remote shell or "connect-back shell" is process used to gain access a victim's remote system by initiating a shell session. The Py-ReverseShell is a shell code written in python that is able to establish a remote connection and upload KeyLoggers and Camera Monitoring onto the Victims systems. Everything Above is for educational purposes only.

projects.title: Stock Game
projects.blurb: Stock game is a python program that simulates real-life stock marketing, saving, and investments. Users get to trade and manage their portfolio and 100,000 dollar portfolio. This code is a very close immitation of the website: https://personalfinancelab.com

projects.title: Python Netcat
projects.blurb: Netcat is a utility tool that uses TCP and UDP connections to read and write data in a network. Py-Netcat is an attempt to imitate the original Netcat in python3 using socket programming.

projects.title: ASCII Art
projects.blurb: ASCII program is an image to text converter, which converts any black and white images into Ascii Art.

projects.title: Real Time Translator
projects.blurb: Real Time Translator is a tool that can perform text translation in real time to the language specified by the user. RT-Translator best works with a Raspberry Pi, imitating a portable translator, especially useful when travelling to places where english might not be the primary language.

projects.title: F.R.I.D.A.Y
projects.blurb: F.R.I.D.A.Y. is a natural-language user interface created by Tony Stark, designed to work with his Iron Man armor. She served as Stark's main user interface computer system during the final battle between the Avengers and Ultron in Sokovia and to find information about Helmut Zemo.
